JUMPANDRUN.highscore.en_US: &aYou've cracked your high score! &7Let's see how far you can get...
JUMPANDRUN.highscore.en_GB: &aYou've cracked your high score! &7Let's see how far you can get...
JUMPANDRUN.highscore.en_XX: &aVerily, thou hast shattered thy highest tally! &7Let us witness how far thou canst journey...
JUMPANDRUN.highscore.de_DE: &aDu hast deinen Highscore geknackt! &7Mal sehen, wie weit du noch kommst...
JUMPANDRUN.highscore.de_AT: &aDu hast dei Highscore g'knaust! &7Schau ma mal, wie weit du no kimmst...
JUMPANDRUN.highscore.de_XX: &aDu hascht deinen Highscore zerhackt! &7Mal sehn, wie weit no kommst...

JUMPANDRUN.you_fell_down.en_XX: &cIn sooth, thou hast fallen too far! &7Thou hast made thee &e[jumps] &7jumps.

JUMPANDRUN.too_far_away.en_XX: &cIn sooth, thou hast strayed too far! &7Thou hast made thee &e[jumps] &7jumps.
JUMPANDRUN.too_far_away.de_DE: &cDu bist zu weit weg! &7Du hast &e[jumps] &7Sprünge geschafft.
